title: Welcome to DeckSmith!
description: To get started, edit "deck.csv" to add new cards, or "deck.json" to change their structure.

title: Building the deck
description: Run "decksmith build" when you are ready to save the cards as images.

title: Exporting to PDF
description: You can create a printable PDF with "decksmith export --width 63.5 --height 88.9 output" after building.

title: Check out the guide
description: Visit "github.com/julynx/decksmith" to learn all the things you can do using DeckSmith. Enjoy!
